remarks: A weaker version of ~ ax-13 with distinct variable restrictions on pairs ` x , z ` and ` y , z ` .  In order to show that this weakening is adequate, this should be the only theorem referencing ~ ax-13 directly. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2016.)
statement:
ax13v $p |- ( -. x = y -> ( y = z -> A. x y = z ) ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
